definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: the contrary, contrariness, perversity;—abs. ´[[ה]] Ez Eze 16:34; [[הֶָפֶךְ]] v:Eze 16:34; sf. [[הַפְכְּכֶם]] Is 29:16 (v. Baer);—

the contrary, opposite thing [[וַיְהִי־בָח הֶפֶךְ מִן־הֵנׇּשִׁים]] Ez Eze 16:34 & there hath occurred in thee the contrary from other women; v:Eze 16:34 [[וַתְּהִי לְהֶָפֶח]] so thou hast become the contrary.
